attributes.action: Devolution of fracking laws to the Scottish Parliament
attributes.additional_details:
The UK Government have announced that they are to remove the rights of householders to object to oil and gas drilling and hydraulic fracturing beneath their homes.

This will include householders in Scotland, and comes after 99 per cent of respondents to the UK Government consultation on the proposals objecting to them.

We the undersigned petition the UK Government to facilitate the devolution of the relevant powers so that Scotland can make its own decision on this serious matter.
